distribution.iterations: v.base = q.heightmap(v.originx, v.originz); v.p0 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + -15, v.originz + -15)); v.p1 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + -15, v.originz + 0)); v.p2 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + -15, v.originz + 15)); v.p3 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + -15, v.originz + 31)); v.p4 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 0, v.originz + -15)); v.p5 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 0, v.originz + 15)); v.p6 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 0, v.originz + 31)); v.p7 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 15, v.originz + -15)); v.p8 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 15, v.originz + 0)); v.p9 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 15, v.originz + 15)); v.p10 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 15, v.originz + 31)); v.p11 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 31, v.originz + -15)); v.p12 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 31, v.originz + 0)); v.p13 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 31, v.originz + 15)); v.p14 = math.abs(v.base - q.heightmap(v.originx + 31, v.originz + 31)); v.check = v.p0 > 9 || v.p1 > 9 || v.p2 > 9 || v.p3 > 9 || v.p4 > 9 || v.p5 > 9 || v.p6 > 9 || v.p7 > 9 || v.p8 > 9 || v.p9 > 9 || v.p10 > 9 || v.p11 > 9 || v.p12 > 9 || v.p13 > 9 || v.p14 > 9; return (math.mod(v.originx, 80) == 0 && math.mod(v.originz, 80) == 0 && v.base > 63 && !v.check);
